subject: Basketball
Radio
Deaths (Obituaries)
Television
lead_paragraph: Mr. Durham called Chicago Bulls games for 18 years and was ESPN Radio’s lead play-by-play commentator for N.B.A. games since 1996.
snippet: Mr. Durham called Chicago Bulls games for 18 years and was ESPN Radio’s lead play-by-play commentator for N.B.A. games since 1996.
